title: 第1周英语练习
subtitle: 质量管理
description: 本周练习包含GMP环境下的核心专业词汇，使用简短例句帮助快速掌握概念。

items.example: Insect killer lamps will be checked daily for proper operation. And the collection trays will be cleaned once daily. Record the inspection in the Insect Killer Lamp Inspection Record.
items.exampleChinese: 每天检查灭虫灯是否运行正常，每天清理一次接收盘，在《灭虫灯检查记录》中记录相应检查情况。

items.example: During production, the number of personnel in the clean area is limited to 8.
items.exampleChinese: 洁净区生产期间限流8人。

items.example: Methods for removing disinfectants after use: ① Removal by natural volatilization. ② Removal by rinsing.
items.exampleChinese: 消毒剂使用后的清除方法：①能通过自然挥发除去的，使自然挥发去除。②通过清洗除去。

items.example: The individual training files of active employees shall be retained permanently. The individual training files of terminated employees and annual training plans shall be retained for a minimum period of five years.
items.exampleChinese: 在职人员个人培训档案永久保存，离职人员的个人培训档案及年度培训计划保存期限至少为五年。

items.example: The release for API and CDMO finished product is approved by Quality Authorizer or Alternate Authorizer or QA Manager.
items.exampleChinese: API 及CDMO 成品由质量授权人或转授权人或QA经理进行批准放行。

items.example: Clean air level is Grade C.
Establishing a system to release or reject raw materials, intermediates, packaging and labelling materials.
items.exampleChinese: 建立放行或拒绝原材料、中间体、包装材料和标签材料的制度；
